Module: CanvasLoader

CanvasLoader uses the HTML5 canvas element in modern browsers and VML in IE6/7/8 to create and animate the most popular preloader shapes (oval, spiral, rectangle, square and rounded rectangle).

It is important to note that CanvasLoader doesn't show up and starts rendering automatically on instantiation. To start rendering and display the loader use the show() method.

This module contains the following classes:

  • CanvasLoader
